verses.verse: ([A Psalm] of David when he feigned madness before Abimelech, who drove him) (away and he departed.) I will bless<WH1288> the Lord<WH3068> at all<WH3605> times;<WH6256> His praise<WH8416> shall continually<WH8548> be in my mouth.<WH6310>
My soul<WH5315> shall make<WH1984> its boast<WH1984> in the Lord;<WH3068> The humble<WH6035> shall hear<WH8085> it and rejoice.<WH8055>
O magnify<WH1431> the Lord<WH3068> with me, And let us exalt<WH7311> His name<WH8034> together.<WH9191>
I sought<WH1875> the Lord,<WH3068> and He answered<WH6030> me, And delivered<WH5337> me from all<WH3605> my fears.<WH4034>
They looked<WH5027> to Him and were radiant,<WH9315> And their faces<WH6440> shall never<WH408> be ashamed.<WH2659>
This<WH2088> poor<WH6041> man<WH6041> cried<WH7121> and the Lord<WH3068> heard<WH8085> him, And saved<WH3467> him out of all<WH3605> his troubles.<WH6869>
The angel<WH4397> of the Lord<WH3068> encamps<WH2583> around<WH5439> those who fear<WH3372> Him, And rescues<WH2502> them.
O taste<WH2938> and see<WH7200> that the Lord<WH3068> is good;<WH2896> How blessed<WH835> is the man<WH1397> who takes<WH2620> refuge<WH2620> in Him!
O fear<WH3372> the Lord,<WH3068> you His saints;<WH6918> For to those who fear<WH3372> Him, there<WH369> is no<WH369> want.<WH4270>
The young<WH3715> lions<WH3715> do lack<WH7326> and suffer<WH7456> hunger;<WH7456> But they who seek<WH1875> the Lord<WH3068> shall not be in want<WH2637> of any<WH3605> good<WH9185> thing.<WH9185>
Come,<WH1980> you children,<WH1121> listen<WH8085> to me; I will teach<WH3925> you the fear<WH3374> of the Lord.<WH3068>
Who<WH4310> is the man<WH376> who desires<WH2655> life,<WH9132> And loves<WH157> [length of] days<WH3117> that he may see<WH7200> good<WH9185>?
Keep<WH5341> your tongue<WH3956> from evil,<WH9563> And your lips<WH8193> from speaking<WH1696> deceit.<WH4820>
Depart<WH5493> from evil,<WH9563> and do<WH6213> good;<WH9185> Seek<WH1245> peace,<WH7965> and pursue<WH7291> it.
The eyes<WH5869> of the Lord<WH3068> are toward<WH413> the righteous,<WH6662> And His ears<WH241> are [open] to their cry.<WH7775>
The face<WH6440> of the Lord<WH3068> is against evildoers,<WH6213> <WH7451> To cut<WH3772> off<WH3772> the memory<WH2143> of them from the earth.<WH776>
[The righteous] cry<WH6817> and the Lord<WH3068> hears,<WH8085> And delivers<WH5337> them out of all<WH3605> their troubles.<WH6869>
The Lord<WH3068> is near<WH7138> to the brokenhearted,<WH7665> <WH3820> And saves<WH3467> those who<WH1793> are crushed<WH1793> in spirit.<WH7307>
Many<WH7227> are the afflictions<WH9567> of the righteous;<WH6662> But the Lord<WH3068> delivers<WH5337> him out of them all.<WH3605>
He keeps<WH8104> all<WH3605> his bones;<WH6106> Not one<WH259> of them is broken.<WH7665>
Evil<WH9567> shall slay<WH4191> the wicked;<WH7563> And those who hate<WH8130> the righteous<WH6662> will be condemned.<WH816>
The Lord<WH3068> redeems<WH6299> the soul<WH5315> of His servants;<WH5650> And none<WH3808> <WH3605> of those who take<WH2620> refuge<WH2620> in Him will be condemned.<WH816>
